item.title: Two panchayat secretaries suspended for faking attendance in Telangana’s Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two panchayat secretaries suspended for faking attendance in Telangana’s Jogulamba Gadwal
Two panchayat secretaries in Jogulamba Gadwal were suspended for faking attendance records. District Collector has mandated biometric verification before 11 am, warning that any future violations will lead to stern action
By Telangana Today Published Date - 2 August 2025, 09:39 PM
Jogulamba Gadwal: Two panchayat secretaries in Jogulamba Gadwal district were suspended on Saturday for allegedly marking fak...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today

item.title: State Monitoring Officer Visits Government Hospital and Medical College in Gadwal, Reviews Healthcare Services and Seasonal Preparedness
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: On August 2nd, State Monitoring Officer Phaninder Reddy, IAS, Managing Director of TGMSIDC, conducted a detailed inspection of the Government Hospital in Gadwal. He was accompanied by Kautilya ED, Venu Gopal EE, and Srinivasulu EE. The team visited various wards of the hospital and reviewed the quality and scope of medical services being provided to the public.
During the visit, the officer inquired about the daily outpatient (OP) and inpatient (IP) statistics, the availability and supp...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
